entry.title: 扬帆，起航
entry.content: 清明假期终于来了，这段时间太压抑无聊了，终于有3天半的假放了，虽然下周一就得密码学期中考试（密码的），但能多歇息一会儿就已经是万幸了。玩了一整个下午的阿瓦隆，梅林无败绩，我的梅林还是太C了，把他们骗得一愣一愣的。晚上又无聊起来不知道干啥，临时起意就准备搭个博客，搭博客还是太吃操作了，这个页面美化真是太难了，要搞吐了全是报错，不过起码有了个乞丐版骨架，之后有时间闲的蛋疼再来优化吧，以我三分钟热度的性子，下一篇博客不只是何时。临时起了个名叫深白色的赛博产房，灵感来源于陶老大的B站名字”陶喆的音乐产房”。我有个初步的想法，每篇文章都得有BGM（如果能做到的话），然后分享一两首歌。今天临时搭的博客，菜鸟深白色啥都不会，只能止步于此了，今天就先安可一首二哥的《此刻，你心里想起谁》吧。这段时间太down了，只想快进到下下周去看二哥的演唱会，去我的几小时的乌托邦去逃避，与这个糟糕的world隔绝几个钟。现在时间不早了，之后有时间再分享点别的吧。

/* 自定义鼠标光标 */body, html { cursor: url(https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/SVGArtist/CursorLibrary/Yellow-Duck/normal.cur), auto !important;}a, button, input[type="submit"], select { cursor: url(https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/SVGArtist/CursorLibrary/Yellow-Duck/link.cur), pointer !important;}/* 页面背景 */body { background: url('https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f52d8261f2e86241999e8c8dbfdb7d80_r.jpg') fixed; background-size: cover; background-position: center;}/* 文章卡片美化 */#recent-posts > .recent-post-item { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); overflow: hidden; transition: all 0.3s;}#recent-posts > .recent-post-item:hover { box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); transform: translateY(-3px);}/* 文章特色图片 */#recent-posts > .recent-post-item .post_cover { overflow: hidden; border-radius: 8px; margin: 10px;}#recent-posts > .recent-post-item .post_cover img { transition: transform 0.6s; object-fit: cover;}#recent-posts > .recent-post-item:hover .post_cover img { transform: scale(1.05);}/* 侧边栏美化 */#aside-content .card-widget { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); backdrop-filter: blur(5px); transition: all 0.3s;}#aside-content .card-widget:hover { box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);}/* 网站头部美化 */#page-header { position: relative; background-color: transparent !important;}#page-header:before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); z-index: -1;}/* 页脚美化 */#footer { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); backdrop-filter: blur(10px);}/* 欢迎弹窗 */#welcome-popup { position: fixed; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95); padding: 20px; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); z-index: 9999; text-align: center; font-size: 16px; display: none; max-width: 80%; line-height: 1.6;}#welcome-popup h3 { margin-top: 0; color: #49b1f5; font-size: 22px;}#welcome-popup p { margin: 10px 0;}#welcome-close { background-color: #49b1f5; color: white; border: none; padding: 8px 15px; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; margin-top: 15px; transition: background-color 0.3s;}#welcome-close:hover { background-color: #37a0e4;}

// 欢迎弹窗功能document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { // 创建欢迎弹窗 const welcomePopup = document.createElement('div'); welcomePopup.id = 'welcome-popup'; welcomePopup.innerHTML = `

欢迎来到深白色的赛博产房!

感谢您的访问，希望您在这里能找到有趣的内容~

`; document.body.appendChild(welcomePopup); // 显示欢迎弹窗 setTimeout(() => { welcomePopup.style.display = 'block'; }, 1000); // 关闭欢迎弹窗 document.getElementById('welcome-close').addEventListener('click', function() { welcomePopup.style.display = 'none'; }); // 添加页面滚动特效 function addScrollAnimation() { const postItems = document.querySelectorAll('.recent-post-item, .card-widget'); // 初始隐藏所有元素 postItems.forEach(item => { item.style.opacity = '0'; item.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)'; item.style.transition = 'opacity 0.6s ease, transform 0.6s ease'; }); // 滚动时显示元素 function revealOnScroll() { const windowHeight = window.innerHeight; const revealPoint = 150; postItems.forEach(item => { const itemTop = item.getBoundingClientRect().top; if (itemTop < windowHeight - revealPoint) { item.style.opacity = '1'; item.style.transform = 'translateY(0)'; } }); } // 初始检查 revealOnScroll(); // 监听滚动事件 window.addEventListener('scroll', revealOnScroll); } // 启动滚动动画 addScrollAnimation(); // 添加鼠标悬停图片放大效果 const postCovers = document.querySelectorAll('.post-cover img'); postCovers.forEach(img => { img.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => { img.style.transform = 'scale(1.05)'; img.style.transition = 'transform 0.6s ease'; }); img.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => { img.style.transform = 'scale(1)'; }); });});
